item.title: 债券市场的痛苦交易转为就业冲击带来的回报
item.description: 就在债券投资者怀疑自己最喜欢的策略之一时，它又卷土重来了。【原文：Just when bond investors were doubting one of their favorite strategies, it’s making a comeback.】

item.title: 特朗普前就业数据主管谴责解雇继任者
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统解雇首席劳工统计学家的做法遭到了她的前任的批评，他称此举毫无根据，会破坏人们对美国经济一组关键数据的信心。【原文：President Donald Trump’s firing of the chief labor statistician was criticized by her predecessor, who called it an unfounded move that will undermine confidence in a key data set on the US economy.】

item.title: 新兴市场大事记：基金重整游戏规则（播客）
item.description: 新加坡的 Marcus Wong 与 Malavika Kaur Makol 一起讨论了在美元于 7 月份反弹的情况下，一些新兴市场投资者如何重新制定他们的投资策略。一些战术性交易包括新兴市场美元债券与本币债务的对比，因为投资者正在重新调整他们对美元的近期看法。【原文：Marcus Wong in Singapore joins Malavika Kaur Makol to discuss how some emerging-market investors are reworking their playbooks given the dollar’s bounceback in July. Some tactical trades include emerging-market dollar bonds versus local currency debt as investors recalibrate their near-term dollar views.】

item.title: 抛售美元 "交易失去吸引力，新兴市场基金调整赌注
item.description: 美元在 7 月份的反弹让一些新兴市场投资者相信，美元将在未来几个月继续上涨。【原文：The dollar’s bounceback in July is convincing some emerging-market investors to bet it will keep rising in coming months.】

item.title: 苹果公司的新 "答案 "团队在人工智能领域推出类似 ChatGPT 的产品
item.description: 苹果公司成立了一个新的 "答案 "团队，正在开发一款可与 ChatGPT 相媲美的精简版软件，以帮助用户获取世界知识。此外：iPhone 17 Pro现身旧金山，苹果在一个月内失去了第四位人工智能研究员。最后，更多关于苹果公司最新高管变动的信息。【原文：Apple has a new “Answers” team developing a stripped-down rival to ChatGPT to help users access world knowledge. Also: An iPhone 17 Pro is spotted in San Francisco, and Apple loses its fourth AI researcher in a month to Meta. Lastly, more on Apple’s latest executive changes.】

item.title: 欧佩克+达成大幅增产协议，以完成一轮减产行动
item.description: 欧佩克+"同意在 9 月份再次大幅提高石油产量，提前一年完成了当前的恢复供应计划，该组织正努力夺回其在全球原油市场上的份额。【原文：OPEC+ agreed on another bumper oil production increase for September, completing its current tranche of supply revival one year early as the group moves to reclaim its share of global crude markets.】

item.title: 天空电视台称 ICG 将斥资 2 亿英镑收购英国三座机场
item.description: 据天空新闻周日报道，ICG Plc 将以约 2 亿英镑（约合 2.64 亿美元）的价格收购英格兰的三个地区机场。【原文：ICG Plc is set to purchase three regional airports in England for around £200 million ($264 million), Sky News said on Sunday.】

item.title: 周一开市前，特朗普关税令瑞士投资者大跌眼镜
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对瑞士征收 39% 的惩罚性出口关税（全球最高关税之一）之后，瑞士股票投资者正在为周一市场重新开盘做好准备。【原文：Swiss stock investors are bracing for Monday’s market reopening after US President Donald Trump slapped a punitive 39% export tariff on the country, among the highest in the world.】

item.title: 陈家强称香港今年有望实现盈余：香港电台
item.description: 据香港电台报道，财政司司长陈茂波表示，如果经济增长势头持续，香港本财政年度可能录得经营盈余，而不是之前预期的赤字。【原文：Hong Kong may record an operating surplus for the current financial year if economic momentum continues, rather than the previously expected deficit, RTHK reported Financial Secretary Paul Chan as saying.】

item.title: 一个令人振奋的 500 亿欧元销售目标让 J. Martins 酝酿 M&A
item.description: 杰罗尼莫-马丁斯公司上一次大规模收购是在近二十年前，该公司可能必须转向更积极的战略，以便在五年内将销售额提高 50%。【原文：Jeronimo Martins, which made its last major acquisition almost two decades ago, may have to shift to a more aggressive strategy in order to boost sales by 50% within five years.】

item.title: 印度尚未指示炼油商停止购买俄罗斯石油
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，印度尚未指示该国的炼油厂停止购买俄罗斯石油，因为印度官员正在努力满足能源需求，并在不进一步激怒美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的情况下维持与莫斯科的关系。【原文：India hasn’t given the country’s oil refiners instructions to stop buying Russian oil, according to people familiar, as officials grapple with meeting energy needs and maintaining ties with Moscow without further angering US President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 马克鲁夫称爱尔兰预算计划有可能导致经济过热

item.title: 沙特化工巨头沙特沙比克公司连续第三次出现净亏损
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯最大的化工公司连续第三个季度出现亏损，低于分析师预计的盈利水平，原因是该公司在行业长期低迷的情况下关闭了一些资产。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s biggest chemical company posted a third consecutive quarterly loss, missing estimates by analysts for a profit, as it shut down some assets amid a prolonged industry downturn.】

item.title: 丹麦经济依赖诺和诺德。制药商的麻烦是否会削弱它的实力？
item.description: 丹麦之所以能成为欧洲少数几个经济不断发展的国家之一，部分原因在于其本土英雄诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）的成功。得益于这家制药巨头的飞速崛起，丹麦去年的经济增长率达到了 3.5%，超过了该地区的大多数国家。但在经历了一系列挫折后，诺和诺德正努力在残酷的美国减肥市场保持优势。【原文：Denmark’s status as one of the few countries in Europe with an expanding economy rests in part on the success of its homegrown hero, Novo Nordisk A/S. Thanks to the pharmaceutical giant’s astronomical rise, the country enjoyed growth of 3.5% last year, outpacing most nations in the region. But after a series of stumbles, Novo is struggling to retain its edge in the cutthroat US weight-loss market.】

item.title: 漫长的科维德对英国经济的影响比其他大多数国家都严重
item.description: 英国的经济仍在遭受长期的 "科维德"（Covid）之害。无与伦比的公共债务激增、120 万人额外领取疾病津贴、战后创纪录的税收负担、臃肿的国家规模以及最重要的是经济增长乏力，这些都是大流行病期间所做决策的持久症状。但有些危害纯属偶然。【原文：Britain’s economy is still suffering from long Covid. The unmatched spike in public debt, the 1.2 million extra people on sickness benefits, the record postwar tax burden, the bulging size of the state and — above all — weak economic growth are the lasting symptoms of decisions taken during the pandemic. But some of the harm was purely accidental.】
